plugins.name: latestaiagents-full
plugins.description: Complete suite: 67 skills + 10 slash commands. Everything you need for professional AI-assisted development.

plugins.name: safety
plugins.description: Essential safety skills. Recommended for everyone. Prevents accidental data loss and destructive operations.

plugins.name: developer
plugins.description: For software developers. Git workflows, code intelligence, and debugging tools. 19 skills total.

plugins.name: mlops
plugins.description: For architects and platform engineers. Multi-agent systems, LangGraph 1.0, LLMOps, and production AI patterns. 20 skills total.

plugins.name: git-mastery
plugins.description: Stop fighting Git. Merge conflicts, undo mistakes, rebase safely, commit messages, branching strategies.

plugins.name: code-intelligence
plugins.description: Ship 10x faster with AI. Context building, code review, refactoring, test generation, debugging workflows.

plugins.name: debug-detective
plugins.description: Find bugs in minutes. Error analysis, log forensics, stack traces, performance profiling, dependency conflicts.

plugins.name: agent-architect
plugins.description: Design multi-agent systems that work. Supervisor patterns, LangGraph 1.0, human-in-loop, checkpointing, A2A protocols. 13 skills.

plugins.name: llmops-guardian
plugins.description: Production LLM systems done right. Cost analysis, caching, rate limiting, audit logging, security, fallbacks.

plugins.name: ai-safety-guardrails
plugins.description: Never let AI destroy your data. Mandatory confirmations for destructive operations, migration safety, backup protocols.

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Comprehensive security skills. OWASP Top 10, API security, secrets detection, and secure coding practices. 16 skills total.

plugins.name: owasp-guardian

plugins.name: rag-architect

plugins.name: devops-sre
